name: European Confederation of Workers' Cooperatives, Social Cooperatives and Social and Participative Enterprises
memberOrga: There are 17 full members and 8 associate members from 15 european countries in the CECOP-CICOPA Europe network. The list of the member organization is available on our web page: http://www.cecop.coop/Members
goal:
- representation: represent the network in front of the EU institutions, as well as other EU organizations, and towards other components of the cooperative movement
- network: definition of common positions with members, contribution to entrepreneurial development, training, data collection and processing, etc
- development and capacity building: support creation and development of national representing organizations of industrial and service cooperatives and other employee owned enterprises in countries where these do not exist
interests: Business and Industry, Competition, Culture, Economy, finance and the euro, Employment and Social Affairs, International co-operation and development, Regional Policy, Research and innovation, Single market, Taxation, Trade, Youth
euInitiatives: CECOP-CICOPA Europe covers mainly the following EU policies: enterprise and SME policies, employment, social inclusion, internal market and competition, regional development, taxation etc.
